mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_number AS "orderNumber", a.document_number AS "documentNumber", a.document_type AS "documentType", a.item_number AS "itemNumber", a.item_name AS "itemName", a.time_of_cost AS "timeOfCost", a.cost_billing_time AS "costBillingTime", a.cost_settlement_time AS "costSettlementTime", a.fee_item AS "feeItem", a.sum_of_many AS "sumOfMany", a.currency AS "currency", a.direction_of_revenue_and_expenditure AS "directionOfRevenueAndExpenditure", a.purse_settlement_note AS "purseSettlementNote", a.shop_number AS "shopNumber", a.jingdong_store_number AS "jingdongStoreNumber", a.brand_store_number AS "brandStoreNumber", a.store_name AS "storeName", a.statement_date AS "statementDate", a.backup_1 AS "backup1", a.state_of_settlement AS "stateOfSettlement", a.import_date AS "importDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_jingdong_bill( id, order_number, document_number, document_type, item_number, item_name, time_of_cost, cost_billing_time, cost_settlement_time, fee_item, sum_of_many, currency, direction_of_revenue_and_expenditure, purse_settlement_note, shop_number, jingdong_store_number, brand_store_number, store_name, statement_date, backup_1, state_of_settlement, import_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderNumber}, #{documentNumber}, #{documentType}, #{itemNumber}, #{itemName}, #{timeOfCost}, #{costBillingTime}, #{costSettlementTime}, #{feeItem}, #{sumOfMany}, #{currency}, #{directionOfRevenueAndExpenditure}, #{purseSettlementNote}, #{shopNumber}, #{jingdongStoreNumber}, #{brandStoreNumber}, #{storeName}, #{statementDate}, #{backup1}, #{stateOfSettlement}, #{importDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_jingdong_bill SET order_number = #{orderNumber}, document_number = #{documentNumber}, document_type = #{documentType}, item_number = #{itemNumber}, item_name = #{itemName}, time_of_cost = #{timeOfCost}, cost_billing_time = #{costBillingTime}, cost_settlement_time = #{costSettlementTime}, fee_item = #{feeItem}, sum_of_many = #{sumOfMany}, currency = #{currency}, direction_of_revenue_and_expenditure = #{directionOfRevenueAndExpenditure}, purse_settlement_note = #{purseSettlementNote}, shop_number = #{shopNumber}, jingdong_store_number = #{jingdongStoreNumber}, brand_store_number = #{brandStoreNumber}, store_name = #{storeName}, statement_date = #{statementDate}, backup_1 = #{backup1}, state_of_settlement = #{stateOfSettlement}, import_date = #{importDate} WHERE id = #{id}
